name: Milking...
description:
Milk the cows and sell their milk! Use the money to improve your milking and buy new cows. Whoever gets the most cows wins!

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN ONE WEEK!

CONTROLS

Mouse scroll - Zoom-in and zoom-out

W, S, A, D - Camera move

WHERE YOU CAN SUPORT ME?

You can support me with subscribe on my YouTube chanel or with follow on my Twitter or you can visit my website.
